abstracts.cdata!:
The restructuring of the Second Reform
            of Secondary Education Project for Jamaica reduces the scope
            of the project to reflect Jamaica's current limited
            fiscal capacity. The loan amount would be reduced from the
            original US$39.8 million to US$12.5 million. The revised
            project development objective encompasses the first two
            original development objectives, namely improving the
            quality and equity of secondary education and expanding
            access to secondary education. However, the impact would be
            significantly less than originally projected, based on the
            scaling down of activities, and the number of schools and
            students directly benefiting from the project will decline.
            No further activities are to be carried out under the third
            objective of the original project design, strengthening
            central and regional capacity, and this element of the
            development objective will be omitted.
